text: Moricandia is a genus of plants of the family Brassicaceae. Moricandia ramburii commonly known as violet cabbage, a native of the Mediterranean, is cultivated as a garden flower. ==Species== * Moricandia arvensis (L.) DC. ** Moricandia arvensis subsp. arvensis ** Moricandia arvensis subsp. suffruticosa (Desf.) Maire * Moricandia crassifolia Gay * Moricandia foetida * Moricandia moricandioides * Moricandia nitens (Viv.) E. A. Durand & Barratte * Moricandia ramburei * Moricandia sonchifolia * Moricandia spinosa Pomel. * Moricandia suffruticosa (Desf.) Coss. & Durieu ==References== Category:Brassicaceae Category:Brassicaceae genera
title: Moricandia
